com.adobe.cq.social.messaging.client.api

Interface MessageCounts


  • public interface MessageCounts
    Represents counts of messages in a message box.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MessageCounts.CountType
      The count type.

      • getNonDeletedUnreadCount

        long getNonDeletedUnreadCount()
        Returns:
        count of not trashed unread messages.

        long getNonDeletedReadCount()
        Returns:
        count of not trashed read messages.

        Returns:

        long getDeletedReadCount()
        Returns:
        count of trashed+read messages.

        Returns:

        long getTotalCount()
        Get the total count of messages in the message box.

      • getTotalSize

        long getTotalSize()
        Get the total size of the message box.
        Returns:
        The total size of the message box.

      • incrementTotalSize

        void incrementTotalSize(long incrementBy)
                 throws PersistenceException
        Increment the value of the total size of the message box. Passing in a negative value performs a decrement.
        Parameters:
        incrementBy - The amount to increment by.
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - If the increment fails.

      • decrementTotalSize

        void decrementTotalSize(long decrementBy)
                 throws PersistenceException
        Decrement value of the total size of the message box.
        Parameters:
        decrementBy - The amount by which to decrement the total size of the message box.
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - If the decrement fails.
